title: Tech Stocks Poised to Gain Ahead of Apple, Amazon Earnings
sub_head: Facebook parent Meta Platforms jumped after results; the yen slid against dollar after the Bank of Japan reaffirmed a low-rate policy
body:
Technology stocks were poised to gain as investors cheered earnings from Meta Platforms and awaited results from Twitter , Apple and Amazon . com.
The Facebook ownerâ€™s stock rose 17% in premarket trading Thursday after the company said it had added more users than investors expected in the first quarter. That gain helped send Nasdaq-100 futures up 2.1%, pointing to a broader rally in tech shares.
